Description.Name: Trick or Treat
Description.Details: Sumire looks up from her console, “Commander, I’m picking up readings of an unknown object in high orbit around [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]].” “Put it on the main screen,” you tell her. Moments later the screen switches to a small uniformly shaped object, obviously man made, “Zoom in and enhance.” Sumire adjusts some controls and zooms in the object, “It’s a dropship, but there are no signs of life or power.” Darius points at the screen, “There is something on the hull. Is that… a pumpkin?” The screen zooms to max and painted on the hull is an orange pumpkin with a face and the words TRICK OR TREAT next to it. Darius scratches his head, “What does that mean?” Dr Murad steps forward, “I believe it is a reference to an old Terran holiday known as Halloween. Originally a day to remember the dead, it transitioned into a holiday where Terran children would dress up in costumes and go door to door to be given treats, usually in the form of candy.” You look at Dr Murad, “so what is the Trick?” Dr Murad smiles, “Some residences would try to scare the children or play pranks on them and what not.” You ponder this information, “So, there are two access doors on the dropship, one for Trick and one for Treat. Which one should we choose?”

Description.Name: TRICK!
Description.Details: You turn to Darius, “Ok, who’s up for a good prank? Darius, get a team over there in our Leopard and let’s see what’s behind Door Number One.” Darius keys in some commands, “The Leopard is dispatching in 10 minutes to dock with the TRICK door, Commander.” The crew watch the live feed on the screen as the away team docks with the derelict ship, then manually unlocks and opens the cargo door. As the door slides back the beam lights show rack upon rack of cargo containers.” You whistle, “Sweet Kerensky, what have we just stumbled upon here?” Darius breaks the reverie, “Don’t forget Commander, that door was labeled TRICK.” You look at Darius, “Noted. Have the team proceed with caution, and start loading those crates onto the Leopard.” As the team are locking down the third crate, an alarm sounds and Darius yells out, “Commander, the ship has activated its self destruct sequence! We have 15 minutes before critical mass!” “Get them out if there and back to the Argo now,” you shout. As the Leopard leaps away from the derelict, its hull shudders and a few seconds later explodes into a ball of fire and molten metal. You turn to the bridge crew, “Well, that could have gone better. Let’s go see what we were tricked into bringing aboard the Argo.” ﻿

Description.Name: TREAT!
Description.Details: You turn to Darius, “Ok, who’s up for a treat? Darius, get a team over there in our Leopard and let’s see what’s behind Door Number Two.” Darius keys in some commands, “The Leopard is dispatching in 10 minutes to dock with the TREAT door, Commander.” The crew watch the live feed on the screen as the away team docks with the derelict ship, then manually unlocks and opens the cargo door. As the door slides back the beam lights show rack upon rack of cargo containers.” You whistle, “Sweet Kerensky, what have we just stumbled upon here?” Darius breaks the reverie, “That door was labeled TREAT, I guess it is a good thing we did not go for the TRICK door!” You look at Darius, “Have the team proceed with loading those crates onto the Leopard.” As the team are locking down the third crate, an alarm sounds and Darius yells out, “Commander, the ship has activated its self destruct sequence! We have 15 minutes before critical mass!” “Get them out if there and back to the Argo now,” you shout. As the Leopard leaps away from the derelict, its hull shudders and a few seconds later explodes into a ball of fire and molten metal. You turn to the bridge crew, “Well, that could have gone better. Let’s go see what treats were brought aboard the Argo.” ﻿
